text:
What's up, everyone? Today we have a really fun 
lesson for you with Ariana Grande on the Ellen

Show. Is it cumbersome to sit down with udders on 
your stomach like that? It's a little hard but um

yeah It's worth it. All right it is it's adorable. 
You'll learn some great vocabulary in this lesson

but before we get into it in case you're new 
here I want to let you know that we help you

to learn fast English without getting lost, 
without missing the jokes and without subtitles

just like this fan who says that he's recommended 
our channel to everyone so don't forget to hit

that subscribe button and the bell down below 
so that you don't miss any of our new lessons.

Are you struggling to understand fast speaking 
natives? Then I highly recommend our Fluent

with Friends course. In this 48-week course you 
will learn with the first two seasons of friends

you'll receive PDF power lessons every 
week, vocabulary memorization software,

access to our fluency circle global community and 
so much more and did you know you can try it right

now for free with our three-part masterclass? All 
you have to do is click up here or down in the

description box below to learn more and sign 
up now. We look forward to seeing you there!

If you're a fan of Ariana Grande then 
I highly recommend you check out this
lesson we made with her song 7 Rings you can click

up here or down in the description 
box below to watch that lesson next!
